original_text: Remember those who are in prison, as though in prison with them, and those who are mistreated, since you also are in the body.
korean_text: 너희도 함께 갇힌 것 같이 갇힌 자를 생각하고 너희도 몸을 가졌은즉 학대 받는 자를 생각하라

sentences.original_text: Remember those who are in prison
as though in prison with them
since you also are in the body
